description:
Enable the picture-in-picture mode on your GNOME desktop.

It might suit if you:

1) can't help watching the next episode on Netflix
2) want to keep an eye on some ongoing terminal left somewhere
3) just enjoy relaxing and playing some YouTube or Vimeo videos

and you are focused on some other stuff in the meantime. 

- Long story short:
PiP for GNOME consists of a resizable and croppable window thumbnail on top of your desktop

- How to fiddle it out:
It's a kind of intuitive tool, however a detailed guide is provided on the GitHub link down below.

Trust the monkey.
name: Window Corner Preview
